'Curve' is a theatre in Leicester, England, based in the Cultural quarter in
Leicester City Centre. Before being named Curve, it was referred to as Leicester
Performing Arts Centre. [http://www.bbc.co.uk/leicester/content-
/articles/2008/01/25/pac_name_unveiled_feature.shtml "PAC Name Unveiled", BBC
Leicester, 29 January 2008] It is adjacent to the Leicester Athena
conference and banqueting centre.
